notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: A.Å., B.E., and A.C. conceived of the initial study. G.B. wrote the supplement and developed the temperature-tolerance concept. J.N. contributed the trait-lag concept. A.Å. and G.B. performed data simulations and analysis. A.Å, G.B., and A.E. wrote the paper. All authors made significant edits to the final version of the manuscript.
